item.source: CONVERT TO ANCIENTS GLITCH ! help me please

item.title: CONVERT TO ANCIENTS GLITCH ! help me please
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

You can try replacing the whole of your case 6552 with my one:

case 6552: { //Ancients magicks altar if (playerAncientMagics == true) { startAnimation(645); setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //turning back to modern magic, setting magic tab to MODERN setSidebarInterface(7, -1); //keeping tab 7 nothing playerAncientMagics = false; sendMessage("You convert back to modern magic."); } else if (playerAncientMagics == false) { startAnimation(645); setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //turning to ancient magicks, setting magic tab to ANCIENT setSidebarInterface(7, -1); //keeping tab 7 nothing playerAncientMagics = true; sendMessage("You convert to Ancient Magicks!"); } } break;

This changes your spellbook (the one next to Prayer menu) to ancients or modern magic.

Read full topic

item.title: CONVERT TO ANCIENTS GLITCH ! help me please
item.dc:creator: @wouterdevos wouterdevos
item.description:
@wouterdevos wrote:

pls some1 help me i can’t change to ancient magicks…;

i have an altar:
makeGlobalObject(2795, 3181, 6552, 0, 10);//Ancients Altar

and a code that normally had to convert me to ancient/normal magic…

case 6552: // Ancient Altar NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magicks !"); } else if { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks !"); } break;

but the only thing i get is… a message! ; you convert to ancient magicks!

[size=16pt]but there doesn’t happen anything with the spellbook !!!
it doesn’t change to ancients !!![/size]
help :([br][size=1]Posted on: June 16, 2007, 02:04:16 PM[/size][hr] hhelp
